english_translation: Allah Almighty will not accept from the dissolute ones (al-saqur) on the Day of Resurrection either ransom (sarf) or compensation ('adl). It was asked: 'Who are al-saqur?' He said: 'Those who do not care who enters upon their wives.'

english_translation: Beware of the supplication of the oppressed one who has no helper except Allah Almighty.

english_translation: The Prophet ﷺ performed Hajj on a saddleless camel, upon which was a covering cloth worth four dirhams or he said four dirhams. Then he said: 'O Allah, make it a Hajj in which there is no showing off (riya') and no seeking reputation (sum'ah).'

english_translation: Verily, this knowledge will be carried by the trustworthy ones of every generation. They will remove from it the distortions of the extremists (ghulat), the false claims of the liars (mubtilun), and the misinterpretations of the ignorant (jahilun).
